title: Add Combo Gift Sets category image to curated categories section

requirements.text: Add and serve a new static category image for the “Combo Gift Sets” card so that the card shows the image instead of the SafeImage fallback UI in the CuratedCategoriesSection. This must affect only the selected card image area/fallback elements (the SafeImage fallback container and its SVG) within the Curated Gift Categories section.

quotes: i want an image of combo gift sets,

acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/category-combo-gift-sets.dim_800x600.png.

On the homepage, in the Curated Gift Categories grid, the “Combo Gift Sets” card renders the new image (loaded via the existing getCategoryImagePath('combo-gift-sets') => /assets/generated/category-combo-gift-sets.dim_800x600.png).
The SafeImage fallback UI (fallback container and its SVG icon) is not shown for the “Combo Gift Sets” card when the new asset is present.
No other category cards or sections are modified beyond the selected elements’ scope.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Backend remains single-actor; no backend changes are required for static image assets.
Apply changes only to the selected elements in the Curated Gift Categories card image/fallback area (as identified by the provided XPaths).
nonGoals: Creating or changing additional category images beyond Combo Gift Sets.
Changing category names/descriptions, adding new categories, or altering homepage layout beyond what is necessary to show the Combo Gift Sets image.

required: Clean category image showing curated combo gift sets (gift hamper/assortment) on a neutral background (category-combo-gift-sets.dim_800x600.png)
